description:
Striking the balance between protection and efficiency, these high-performance trail runners are ideal for tackling rugged terrain. Well-cushioned, responsive midsoles protect your feet and its enhanced heel brake checks speed on descents. Low-to-the-ground framework helps keep you stable on uneven ground.

  • Uppers are made from 60% recycled content with TPU overlays for durability
  • Compression-molded EVA midsole cushions and comforts underfoot
  • Reinforced nylon shank stabilizes feet on uneven terrain
  • Scarpa Sock-Fit provides a comfortable fit that hugs your foot
  • Full perimeter rubber rand for added durability
  • Presa® outsole with SuperGum rubber absorbs shocks and grips to slippery and loose surfaces
  • Aggressive lugs suit rugged terrain and offer effective braking on descents
name: Scarpa Ribelle Run XT Trail Running Shoes - Men's
